content: **note this pattern is available for free at my blog site ** select visit pattern website to access content a sweet blanket that features a diamond flower motif and colour work this blanket can be made from yarn of any ply or fibre it can be sized to individual preference by working the simple eight round repeat as many times as desired it works up very quickly and is advanced beginner worthy the pattern includes detailed instructions for constructing 4 repeats and simplified instructions for constructing additional repeats the example blankets - refer to images - use either dk or worsted weight yarn of between 230g to 600g in total details are provided within the pattern instructions for yarn and hook size for these projects make a lovely matching vintage vibes baby beanie or vintage vibes adult beanie to go with your blanket https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vintage-vibes-baby-beanie https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vintage-vibes-beanie i hope you enjoy making your blanket remember to #vintagevibesblanket @thecrochetfix in social media so i can see all your lovely finished items **tip if your blanket takes the appearance of turning work 1 to 3 rounds of each repeat on the reverse side this isn t an issue for all makers however it will solve the problem for those whom it occurs for **
